function.name: submission_eval
function.description: This function is used to evaluate the below submission to the consultation. This submission is from a news media organisation. Each parameter property is a question that you must respond to after carefully reading the description.

regulating_news.description:
Does the submission comment on whether professional news content should be excluded or included under the proposed changes? If no comment on this issue, return ‘No comment’. If the submission does discuss this issue, return which of the following categories best describes the submission’s position. Possible positions:1. Professional news content should be excluded
2. Professional news content should be included
3. Other (please describe in one sentence or less).

republished_content.description: Does the submission explicitly comment on whether content published by news media organisations be excluded when republished on other platforms? If so, please provide a brief summary of the comment, and the reasoning behind the submitter's belief. If no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.

changes.description: Does this submission provide suggestions on what changes need to be made to the Bill? If so, please list each suggested change with a very brief summary (no more than a line in total), with the most important changes first. You do not need to describe each change in detail; just give a one-line statement of what the submitter requests to be changed. If there is no comment on this aspect, return 'No comment'.
